name: Don't Fail
description:
It's the weekend before the test and you haven't studied much! Try to balance all the aspects of your life and get some studying in before time runs out.

Controls:

  • A and D  - to move left and right.
  • E - to interact with an object in the room.
  • Spacebar - used during the mini-game to stop the moving indicator.

This game was made by a team:

  • Design by Devan Gray
  • Coding by Jonathan Taylor 
  • Artwork by Sanah Hanif. 

This game was made for a university assignment.
